sentences.sContent: We underestimated how long it would take to get there.
sentences.sCn: 我们低估了到那里所需的时间。

sentences.sContent: Never underestimate the power of the press.
sentences.sCn: 绝不要低估新闻界的力量。

sentences.sContent: ...At no time should we underestimate the power of invention...
...They underestimate themselves when selecting a university...

remMethod.val: under(不足) ＋ estimate(估计) → 估计不足 → 低估

trans.tranOther: to think or guess that something is smaller, cheaper, easier etc than it really is
